basic_node.title: Number concentration of atm. particles
basic_node.description: Number concentration of atmospheric aerosol particles in regular automotive lidar surroundings is high enough to interact measurable with laser beams. Number concentration of accumulated hydrometeors depending on environmental influences.
basic_node.references: [sp18, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: Transmission term T(R): Extinction coefficient α(R;λ): Number concentration N_j(R); p.10-11.] [sp18, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271611001158, Formula reference to be added.] [sp18, http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/7535399/, Formula reference to be added.] [sp22, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: Transmission term T(R): Backscatter coefficient β(R; λ): Number concentration N_j(R); p.9.]
